title: New: Overcoats – Hold Me Close
body:
NY’s **Overcoats** feel like a very important act right now.

Having recently announced the release of their debut album, YOUNG, through Arts & Crafts, due out April 21, they’re also streaming the luxurious lead single, Hold Me Close. Two years since their debut EP, the duo now come across as more confident, backed by slicker production and their addictively emotive songwriting. Check out _Hold Me Close_ below.
